law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 194, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 4.
